sources.name: ABC News
sources.description: Your trusted source for breaking news, analysis, exclusive interviews, headlines, and videos at ABCNews.com.

sources.name: CBS News
sources.description: CBS News: dedicated to providing the best in journalism under standards it pioneered at the dawn of radio and television and continue in the digital age.

sources.name: NBC News
sources.description: Breaking news, videos, and the latest top stories in world news, business, politics, health and pop culture.

sources.name: Fox News
sources.description: Breaking News, Latest News and Current News from FOXNews.com. Breaking news and video. Latest Current News: U.S., World, Entertainment, Health, Business, Technology, Politics, Sports.

sources.name: CNN
sources.description: View the latest news and breaking news today for U.S., world, weather, entertainment, politics and health at CNN

sources.name: Google News
sources.description: Comprehensive, up-to-date news coverage, aggregated from sources all over the world by Google News.

sources.name: Hacker News
sources.description: Hacker News is a social news website focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship. It is run by Paul Graham's investment fund and startup incubator, Y Combinator. In general, content that can be submitted is defined as "anything that gratifies one's intellectual curiosity".

sources.name: National Geographic
sources.description: Reporting our world daily: original nature and science news from National Geographic.

sources.name: New Scientist
sources.description: Breaking science and technology news from around the world. Exclusive stories and expert analysis on space, technology, health, physics, life and Earth.

sources.name: Newsweek
sources.description: Newsweek provides in-depth analysis, news and opinion about international issues, technology, business, culture and politics.

sources.name: TechCrunch
sources.description: TechCrunch is a leading technology media property, dedicated to obsessively profiling startups, reviewing new Internet products, and breaking tech news.

sources.name: TechRadar
sources.description: The latest technology news and reviews, covering computing, home entertainment systems, gadgets and more.

sources.name: The New York Times
sources.description: The New York Times: Find breaking news, multimedia, reviews & opinion on Washington, business, sports, movies, travel, books, jobs, education, real estate, cars & more at nytimes.com.

sources.name: The Wall Street Journal
sources.description: WSJ online coverage of breaking news and current headlines from the US and around the world. Top stories, photos, videos, detailed analysis and in-depth reporting.

sources.name: Time
sources.description: Breaking news and analysis from TIME.com. Politics, world news, photos, video, tech reviews, health, science and entertainment news.

sources.name: USA Today
sources.description: Get the latest national, international, and political news at USATODAY.com.

sources.name: Wired
sources.description: Wired is a monthly American magazine, published in print and online editions, that focuses on how emerging technologies affect culture, the economy, and politics.
